name: Battle of Salamis
description:
Battle of Salamis is an educational mini game based on the strategy game Battleship.

It is a single player game, designed to play on touch screen devices (mobile phones, tablets etc).

Your goal is to sink the enemy fleet by choosing a square of the grid to hit, on each round. Before each shot you are called to answer a question regarding the battle of Salamis. For each correct answer you are rewarded with a power up.

If you fail to sink all enemy's ships with the available attacks you are prompted to read some facts about the battle of Salamis on screen and try again.
